function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on indoor health factors","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and compromised well-being","Mitigation":"Increased focus on Indoor Environmental Quality (IEQ) factors such as lighting, acoustic and thermal conditions, indoor air quality, ventilation, humidity, spatial organization, ergonomics, and aesthetics","Technologies":"Sensor-based monitoring systems, IoT devices, advanced ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"Building designers, architects, facility managers"},{"Description":"Limited attention to occupant health research","Impact":"Neglect of potential health risks and lack of informed decision-making in building design","Mitigation":"Increased focus on occupant health research, integration of health impact assessments in building design processes","Technologies":"Health impact assessment tools, data analytics for health research","People":"Researchers, building designers, architects","Owner":"Research institutions, building design firms"},{"Description":"Reliance on subjective assessments for health evaluation","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of occupant health and well-being","Mitigation":"Integration of objective assessments through physiological measurements using sensors, psychometric tests, and medical tests","Technologies":"Physiological measurement sensors, psychometric testing tools, medical testing equipment","People":"Occupants of built environments, researchers","Owner":"Building designers, researchers, healthcare professionals"}]}
